scene_description_enriched: The image depicts Christ, crowned with thorns and bearing wounds on his body, likely from scourging. He is shown seated, with his hands bound by chains. To his left, a column is visible, to which a rope is tied, suggesting his binding. To his right, a whip or flagellum hangs from a pole. The scene is framed by architectural elements, suggesting an interior setting or a symbolic representation of his Passion.
